title: Bulgarian (1991) Genesis Portion
description: Bulgarian translation of the first four chapters of Genesis published in 1991 by the United Bible Societies. Bulgarian is a South Slavic language spoken in Southeastern Europe, primarily in Bulgaria.

language.name: Bulgarian
language.location: Greece and The Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia
language.area: Also in Canada, Croatia, Czech Republic, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Libya, Moldova, Romania, Russian Federation (Europe), Serbia, Slovakia, Turkey (Europe), Ukraine, United States.
